Title: New IT Standard Request Form
Description:
To request unapproved software:

Complete the New Software Request form by clicking this cell.
For additional details on the process, review the How to Request New Software document.
After you submit the New Software Request form, you will receive an email with a Request Tracker (RT) ticket number. Track your request with the ticket number.

Our goal in the CTO office is to continuously improve our processes and ensure we are able to meet your technology needs. Please send feedback by clicking the POC cell to the right.

Title: TIME Assessment for Each System
Description: TIME assessments for systems are now conducted through specific Google Sheets made for each system. Click this cell to open the template Google Sheet to fill out for your specific system. If you have any questions, click the POC cell to email the EA Team.
